TopicTitle: What are co-ordinates to a munar arch

Articles.Content: Look for the biggest crater in the moon, on the right side where it seems like a river splits off or somewhat, that's where an arch is located.
Orbit mun at 30000 m and you'll see soon enough.

The easy one is near the equator, which is...

2 degrees 28 minutes 43 seconds NORTH

81 degrees 30 minutes 47 seconds EAST

The less commonly spotted one is...

12 degrees 28 minutes 2 seconds NORTH

39 degrees 8 minutes 16 seconds EAST
